help.title: Help & Support
help.faqCancelAppointment: How can I cancel an appointment?
help.faqCancelAppointmentAnswer: You can cancel your appointment from the 'My Appointments' section. Select the appointment you want to cancel and press the 'Cancel' button. Note that some cancellations may be subject to business policies.
help.faqPaymentsAnswer: This app does not process payments. Payment is made directly at the establishment according to their accepted methods (cash, card, transfer).
help.faqModifyBookingAnswer: Yes, you can modify your reservation as long as it's in advance. Go to 'My Appointments', select the appointment and look for the modify option. Availability of changes depends on the business.
help.faqBusinessCancel: What do I do if the business cancels my appointment?
help.faqBusinessCancelAnswer: If a business cancels your appointment, you will receive an immediate notification. You can reschedule at no additional cost or choose another establishment.
help.faqLeaveReview: How do I leave a review?
help.faqLeaveReviewAnswer: After your visit, you will receive a notification to leave a review. You can also go to the business profile and select 'Write review' at any time.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.section1Content:
We collect information you provide directly to us, including:

• Full name
• Email address
• Phone number
• Physical address (optional)
• Date of birth (optional)
• Profile photo (optional)
privacy.section2Content:
We use the collected information to:

• Manage your reservations and appointments
• Send reminders and confirmations
• Personalize your experience in the app
• Communicate with you about promotions and news
• Improve our services
privacy.section3Content: We share your information only with the establishments where you make reservations, so they can provide you with the requested service. We do not sell or share your personal information with third parties for marketing purposes.
privacy.section4Content:
We implement technical and organizational security measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure or destruction. This includes:

• Data encryption in transit (HTTPS/TLS)
• Secure storage on protected servers
• Role-based access control
• Regular security audits
privacy.section5Content:
You have the right to:

• Access your personal data
• Rectify incorrect information
• Request deletion of your data
• Object to processing of your data
• Download a copy of your data
privacy.section6Content:
Important: This app does not process payments. Cancellation and refund policies are established by each establishment individually. We recommend:

• Cancel at least 24 hours in advance
• Check the specific establishment policy
• Some establishments may charge for late cancellations
privacy.section7Content: We use local storage to save your preferences and improve your experience. This includes language preferences, theme (light/dark) and notification settings.
privacy.section8Content: We may update this privacy policy occasionally. We will notify you of any significant changes through the app or by email.
privacy.section9Content: If you have questions about this privacy policy or how we handle your data, you can contact us at:

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.section1Content:
By accessing or using the Bookwise application, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service. If you do not agree to these terms, please do not use our services.

These terms apply to all users of the app, including browsers, customers, and merchants.
terms.section2Content:
Bookwise provides a platform that connects customers with beauty and wellness service providers. We facilitate:

• Appointment booking and management
• Business discovery and reviews
• Communication between customers and businesses
• Reminder notifications for appointments
terms.section3Content:
To use certain features of our service, you must create an account. You are responsible for:

• Maintaining the confidentiality of your account credentials
• All activities that occur under your account
• Notifying us immediately of any unauthorized use
• Providing accurate and complete information
terms.section4Content:
When you book an appointment through Bookwise:

• You agree to the establishment's specific policies
• Cancellations should be made at least 24 hours in advance
• No-shows may result in restrictions on your account
• Individual businesses may have additional policies

Note: Bookwise does not process payments. All transactions occur directly with the service provider.
terms.section5Content:
You agree not to:

• Violate any applicable laws or regulations
• Impersonate any person or entity
• Submit false or misleading information
• Harass or abuse service providers
• Attempt to manipulate reviews or ratings
• Use the service for any illegal purpose
terms.section6Content:
Bookwise acts solely as an intermediary between customers and service providers. We are not responsible for:

• The quality of services provided by businesses
• Disputes between customers and providers
• Personal injuries or property damage
• Business availability or pricing changes
terms.section7Content: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. Continued use of the service after changes constitutes acceptance of the new terms. We will notify users of significant changes via the app or email.
